p: In addition, the partial correlation method was used to analyze the correlation between detrended VPD and detrended NDVI/LAI of five satellite-based datasets, excluding the impacts of air temperature, radiation, and atmospheric [CO 2] concentration. Because of the obvious transitions of VPD, NDVI, and LAI from 1982 to 2015, we used piecewise linear regression approach to determine the TP and then removed the trends before and after the TP before the correlation analysis.
